title: Macworld Podcast: M4 iMac, M4 MacBook Pro, M4 Mac mini now available
content:
Macworld

This week is full of treats from Apple! We’ve got a new iMac, new MacBook Pros, and a new Mac mini, all sporting the new M4 chip. We talk about the new products and more on this episode of the Macworld Podcast! And we promise, no tricks!

This is episode 907 with Jason Cross, Michael Simon, and Roman Loyola.

Watch episode 907 on YouTube

Listen to episode 907 on Apple Podcasts

Listen to episode 907 on Spotify

Get info

Click on the links below for more information on what was discussed on the show.

  • The M4 MacBook Pro gets a great camera at last, Thunderbolt 5, more RAM
  • Apple just gave the MacBook Air a huge upgrade you probably didn’t notice
  • The Mac mini finally lives up to its name
  • The M4 iMac has 16GB RAM and a 12MP Center Stage camera standard
  • Apple’s Mac accessories finally switch from Lightning to USB-C
  • What you need to know about Thunderbolt 5
  • What is nano-texture glass and do I need it?
